General.Name: INPAQ Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: INPAQ Technology Co., Ltd. provides circuit protection components and antenna products for computing, communication, consumer electronics, and automotive electronics primarily in Taiwan, China, Korea, and North America. It offers RF antennas, such as patch, active, chip, dipole, NFC, RFID, and customized antennas, as well as automotive, wireless power charger, module system, and LTC technology products. The company also provides SMD metal oxide varistor, ESD, transient voltage suppressor, and multilayer varistor; chip ferrite bead and common mode filter; and power, general circuits, and high frequency inductors. Its products are used in phones, tablets, NBs, TVs, and set top boxes, as well as automotive and network applications. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Miaoli, Taiwan.
